name: Ciki Riki Night Club
description:
A simple and relaxing game. Give drinks to the costumers.

Controls:

  • WASD -Move
  • E - Interact
  • [ESC] - exit

This game has no goal.  Feel free to play as much as you want.

Music produced by lukrembo

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcUuUhBChMXm-irdwoFT-vg
